column5: Hey There Everyone  I am just wondering how the ice is on Lake Nipissing. I booked Smittys for the first weekend in Febuary. Just very curious how the ice conditions are in that area. Im starting to get worried with all the mild temps we are getting here in Hamilton. Has Anyone been to Smittys??? Any feedback or comments would be greatly appriciated.  Thanks in advance and be safe

havent' been to smitty's, but sleds are all over the lake and shacks are starting to dot the shores. Two trucks were parked approx 200 meters out from sunset point. There was about 11 -12 inches near shore. You should be fine by Feb.
Thanks for the info Rod Caster
I was talking to Sandy bay yesterday and they said they have 11" to 12". with cars and trucks out. Also said walleye bite was good, can't wait.
Lots of ice on "most" of the lakes. Trucks all over Callander Bay today.
I was up there this weekend.  There was 12" to 14" of ice on south bay.  You will have no problem by February.
Thanks to everyone for the feed back  Cheers and be safe
